attacks.name: Back Burner
attacks.effect: Search your discard pile for up to 2 basic Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Split Bomb
attacks.effect: Choose 2 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
